data.title: Lithium-Ion Battery Market Growing Steadily At 17.5 % CAGR, Surging Towards US$ 148 Billion Valuation By 2030
data.meta_description: Press release - Polaris Market Research & Consulting - Lithium-Ion Battery Market Growing Steadily At 17.5 % CAGR, Surging Towards US$ 148 Billion Valuation By 2030 - published on openPR.com
data.text:
Lithium-Ion Battery Market

𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐮𝐦-𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐛𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐤𝐞𝐭 𝐬𝐢𝐳𝐞 𝐢𝐬 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐭𝐨 𝐛𝐞 𝐯𝐚𝐥𝐮𝐞𝐝 𝐚𝐭 𝐔𝐒𝐃 35.23 𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐢𝐧 2021 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐢𝐬 𝐞𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐭𝐨 𝐫𝐢𝐬𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐔𝐒𝐃 148 𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐛𝐲 2030. 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐤𝐞𝐭 𝐢𝐬 𝐞𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐭𝐨 𝐫𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐚 𝐂𝐀𝐆𝐑 𝐨𝐟 17.5% 𝐝𝐮𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐨𝐝 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 2022 𝐭𝐨 2030.

𝐕𝐚𝐫𝐢𝐨𝐮𝐬 𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐝𝐞𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐮𝐦-𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐛𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝐢𝐧𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐝𝐞:

• Advancements in technology have resulted in lower pricing for battery components used in battery manufacturing, lowering the price of lithium-ion batteries, which is a major driver driving market growth.

• Rising petrol and diesel prices have raised customer awareness of electric vehicles, driving industry growth.

• The expanding use of electric vehicles, as well as the expansion of the automotive sector, has raised the demand for lithium-ion batteries.

𝐆𝐞𝐭 𝐄𝐱𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐒𝐚𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐏𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐓𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐑𝐞𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭: https://www.polarismarketresearch.com/industry-analysis/lithium-ion-battery-market/request-for-sample

𝐖𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐢𝐬 𝐚 𝐋𝐢𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐮𝐦-𝐈𝐨𝐧 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲?

Lithium ions flow between the positive and negative electrodes of a lithium-ion battery, a type of rechargeable power storage device, to store and release electrical energy. This specific type of rechargeable battery has found extensive application in electric vehicles, portable electronics, and renewable energy systems.

𝐓𝐨𝐩 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐬:

In this extremely competitive industry, major rivals constantly innovate and differentiate their products in an effort to take the lead in the market. Some of the leading companies in the lithium-ion battery market are:

• Automotive Energy Supply Corporation

• BAK Power

• BYD Company Limited

• Clarion Power Solutions

• Contemporary Ampere Technology Co. Ltd

• Duracell Inc.

• Hitachi Ltd

• Johnson Controls

• LG Chem Ltd

• Maxell Holdings Ltd

• Murata Manufacturing Co. Ltd

• Panasonic Corporation

• Renault Group

• Saft Group S.A.

• Samsung SDI Co. Ltd

• Tesla

• Toshiba Corporation

𝐁𝐮𝐲 𝐍𝐨𝐰 𝐓𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐮𝐦 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐜𝐡 𝐑𝐞𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐬: https://www.polarismarketresearch.com/buy/520/2

𝐋𝐢𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐮𝐦-𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐌𝐚𝐫𝐤𝐞𝐭 𝐑𝐞𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐬 :

• The growing demand for portable lithium-ion batteries is due to rising consumer products such as tablets, laptops, and smartphones. Moreover, the growing demand for these batteries in the healthcare sector in pulse oximeters and patch-type devices bolstered market growth.

• Lithium cobalt oxide accounted for the highest revenue share in 2021 and is expected to continue its dominance owing to better energy, power density, and cycling ability. These batteries are used in digital cameras and electronic devices, supporting market growth.

• The automotive sector is the second largest segment expected to grow over the forecast period due to the rising hybrid and plug-in hybrid vehicles across emerging nations. The growing consumer shift from conventional to electric vehicles is also increasing the demand for lithium-ion batteries.

• Asia Pacific is expected to grow over the forecast period due to the growing consumer electronics and automotive industry across China, India, and Japan. The strict government norms emphasizing the usage of electric vehicles due to rising CO2 emission has increased the sale of batteries boosting the market.

𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐥𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐞𝐡𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐑𝐞𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐇𝐞𝐫𝐞: https://www.polarismarketresearch.com/industry-analysis/lithium-ion-battery-market

𝐒𝐞𝐠𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐁𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐤𝐝𝐨𝐰𝐧:

The lithium-ion battery market is mainly segmented based on material, product, type, capacity, voltage, industry, and region. Based on the material type, the cathodic lithium-ion battery element generated the most income in 2021 because it determines battery features and capacity. Cathodic compounds also aid in improving the battery's conductivity.

Furthermore, according to product research, the portable category is predicted to dominate market growth throughout the projection period due to its lightweight and ease of installation. Batteries used in mobile appliances are becoming increasingly important as consumer electronics, including smartwatches and smartphones, gain popularity, which is anticipated to drive the market throughout the projection period.

o Cathode Material

o Anode Material

o Electrolyte Material

o 3000 To 10000 mAh 10000 To 60000 mAh

o Medium (12 V- 36 V)

o High (Above 36 V)

• 𝐁𝐲 𝐈𝐧𝐝𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐲

o Consumer Electronics

o Automotive

o Aerospace

o Marine

o Medical

o Industrial

o Telecommunications

𝐑𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐋𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐬𝐜𝐚𝐩𝐞:

• North America (U.S., Canada)

• Europe (France, Germany, UK, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Russia)

• Asia Pacific (Japan, China, India, Malaysia, Indonesia, South Korea)

• Latin America (Brazil, Mexico, Argentina)
